name: logworks-site
description: Source for the Skreieweydo Logworks website. Built with SCSS, modular assets, and automated GitHub Actions deploy to server.

scripts.clean: rm -rf css && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: npm run sass && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css && cp index.html dist/ && cp -R css/* dist/css/ && mkdir -p dist/api && cp -R api/* dist/api/ && mkdir -p dist/blog && cp -R blog/* dist/blog
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve dist -l 5173

author: skreieweydo
